## upterm session list

List shared sessions

### Synopsis

List shared sessions. Session admin sockets are located in ~/.upterm.

```
upterm session list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List shared sessions:
  upterm session list
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```
